text:
I created a Docker Hub repo that has two versions of Julia from the official repo, and I added Miniconda and Jupyterlab on top.
<https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/statisticalmice/julia-jupyter>
I found four other repos that match ‘julia-jupyter’, but they were rather old. Of course the ‘jupyter/datascience-notebook’ is much more feature rich, but it’s also 4x as large. I checked that Jupyterlab started from these can run Julia, manually.
